SELECT com.* FROM sys_role com WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( com.description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keywords , jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') )
ORDER BY com.create_time DESC

SELECT r.id, r.name, r.description, ( CASE WHEN ( SELECT ur.role_id FROM sys_user_role ur WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND ur.role_id = r.id ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS selected FROM sys_role r WHERE r.available = 1
SELECT r.id, r.name, r.description FROM sys_role r INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.available = 1
